entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , La Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:18 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Hubert Airport 5:32 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
